T02D3214:218a-1: ku ru kull'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3214:218a-4: ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3214:218a-5: sngar bzhin du stong pa nyid pa nyid kyi mthar thug par rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3214:218a-6: yi ge ra yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma
T02D3214:218a-7: la yi ge hr'i: las spro ba dang bsdu ba'i
T02D3214:218a-9: skad cig gis de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ma ku ru kulle ste /
T02D3214:218a-11: sku mdog dmar mo padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad
T02D3214:218a-12: pa dang nyi ma la rdo rje skyil krung gis
T02D3214:218b-0: @218b bzhugs shing / gzhal yas khang gi nang na gnas pa /
T02D3214:218b-1: phyag dang po gnyis kyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D3214:218b-2: g-yas pa'i phyag lhag ma rnams kyis ni lcags kyu dang /
T02D3214:218b-3: rna ba'i drung du bkang ba'i mda' dang /
T02D3214:218b-4: mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D3214:218b-5: g-yon pa'i phyag lhag ma rnams kyis ni zhags pa dang gzhu dang autpala bsnams pa'o //
T02D3214:218b-6: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3214:218b-7: shar gyi 'dab ma la rab tu dang ba'i sgrol ma'o //
T02D3214:218b-8: lho'i 'dab ma la grub pa'i sgrol ma'o //
T02D3214:218b-9: nub kyi 'dab ma la rgyal ba'i sgrol ma'o//
T02D3214:218b-10: byang gi 'dab ma la rna ba'i sgrol ma'o //
T02D3214:218b-11: dbang ldan gyi 'dab ma la tsundra'o //
T02D3214:218b-12: me'i 'dab ma la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o //
T02D3214:218b-13: bden bral gyi 'dab ma la mar me rab tu gsal bar snang ba'o //
T02D3214:218b-14: rlung gi 'dab ma la sgrol ma dkar mo bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3214:218b-15: de dag thams cad kyang kha dog dmar mo de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dbu rgyan du gyur pa /
T02D3214:218b-16: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3214:218b-17: g-yas pa'i phyag dag gis mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D3214:218b-18: rna ba'i bar du bkang ba'i mda' bsnams pa /
T02D3214:218b-19: g-yon pa'i phyag gis autpala dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D3214:218b-20: shar gyi sgor ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ste
T02D3214:218b-21: gsus pa 'jol ba zhal rnam par bsgyur ba mdog
T02D3214:218b-22: dmar ba mi bskyod pa dbu rgyan la bzhugs pa
T02D3214:218b-23: / g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D3214:218b-24: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3214:218b-25: lho sgor ni gzhan gyis mi thub ma ste kha
T02D3214:218b-26: dog ser mo dbu rgyan la rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D3214:218b-27: bzhugs pa / phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis ni dbyug pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D3214:218b-28: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ni dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3214:218b-29: nub sgor ni ral gcig ma ste kha dog nag mo skra ni gyen la gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02D3214:218b-30: tshems kyis ma mchu kun nas bsdams pa /
T02D3214:218b-31: dbu rgyan la snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs pa /
T02D3214:218b-32: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na rdo rje dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D3214:219a-0: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na dril bu dang @219a * //
T02D3214:219a-2: byang gi sgor ni rdo rje dri za ma ste
T02D3214:219a-3: ser ljang ma don yod grub pa dbu rgyan la
T02D3214:219a-4: bzhugs pa / zhal rnam par bsgyur pa /
T02D3214:219a-6: phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis ni kha tv'am ga dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D3214:219a-7: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ni dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa bsam par bya ste /
T02D3214:219a-8: bzhi po de dag rnams ni g-yon bskum pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3214:219a-9: de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D3214:219a-10: lag pa gnyis kyi rgyab gnyis sprad la srin lag
T02D3214:219a-11: gnyis mdud pa byas shing mthe'u chung gnyis dang gung
T02D3214:219a-12: mo gnyis kyis kun nas dkris te /
T02D3214:219a-13: mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i rnam pa ltar byas pa
T02D3214:219a-14: 'gying ba dang ldan pas dpral ba'i phyogs su gzung
T02D3214:219a-15: bar bya ba'o // bsgoms pas dub na sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3214:219a-16: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02D3214:219a-17: khri bzlas pas skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3214:219a-18: khri phrag gis ni bka' blon pa'o //
T02D3214:219a-19: autpala dang mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i shing aa
T02D3214:219a-20: shvadtha dang yam shing rnams kyis sbyin sreg byas na
T02D3214:219a-22: dpal 'bras kyi shing gi me legs par sbar la
T02D3214:219a-23: mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i dpal 'bras 'jug sbyin
T02D3214:219a-24: sreg byas pas ni rgyal po'i blon po dbang du
T02D3214:219a-25: 'gyur ro // autpala stong sbyin sreg byas shing lha
T02D3214:219a-26: mo'i mdun du mar gyi mar me stong phul bas
T02D3214:219a-27: ni rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3214:219a-28: ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3214:219a-30: // /'di ni aindra bh'u ti ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa yin no //
